title: Machine Learning
description: Machine learning techniques and applications. Topics include foundational issues; inductive, analytical, numerical, and theoretical approaches; and real-world applications. Credit not awarded for both CS 4641 and CS 7641/CSE 6740/ISYE 6740/ECE 4252.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ISYE 3133 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (MATH 1553 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X53 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1554 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X54 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1564 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 1551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
